content: **crocheted long jumper in drops belle the piece is worked bottom up with lace pattern boat-neck and ¾-length sleeves sizes s - xxxl ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ #sunnyislessweater drops design pattern vs-118 yarn group b ------------------------------------------------------- **sizes** s - m - l - xl - xxl - xxxl **yarn** drops belle from garnstudio belongs to yarn group b 400-450-500-550-600-650 g colour 04 dandelion **crochet hook** drops crochet hook size 4 5 mm **crochet gauge** 16 treble crochets in width and 8 row in height with hook size 4 5 mm = 10 x 10 cm hook size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm change to a larger hook size if you get too few stitches on 10 cm change to a smaller hook size
